item.title: OpenShift RBAC
item.description: OpenShift RBAC oc auth can-i VERB OBJECT oc adm policy who-can VERB OBJECT oc get clusterrole basic-user -o yaml oc get clusterrole cluster-admin -o yaml https://www.openshift.com/blog/fine-grained-iam-roles-for-openshift-applications
